thread.title: Lenovo A6000 and A6000 Plus Getting Android 5.0 Lollipop in India
thread.title_full: Lenovo A6000 and A6000 Plus Getting Android 5.0 Lollipop in India - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Lenovo A6000 and A6000 Plus Getting Android 5.0 Lollipop in India
text: Lenovo A6000 made its debut in India back in March, while the improved version of the affordable smartphone was launched one month later. At the time of their launch, both smartphones were powered by Android 4.4.4 KitKat operating system, which for some was better than Lollipop. However, the Chinese company promised to bring both its mid-range smartphones to Lollipop as soon as possible. Well, it looks like it took Lenovo more than a few months to finally release the ... Â»
